fields.headline: New beginnings
fields.bodyText: Welcome to Higher Noon, academic news and opinion, twice weekly from EducationGuardian.co.uk Latest Kent offers scholarships to Romanian students The University of Kent has become the first UK institution to offer scholarships to students from one of the newest European Union members, Romania. Click here for more. Mathematician appointed vice-chancellor of East London The University of East London has appointed Martin Everett as vice-chancellor. Click here for more. Historian arrested for jaywalking A British historian claims that he was knocked to the ground by a policeman before being arrested and spending eight hours in jail because he inadvertently committed the offence of "jaywalking" in the US.
